column2: # SpaceR = rows in the simulated grid space
# SpaceC = columns in the simulated grid space
# burn = burn in for movement initial equilibration of movement (use option Graphs in ""Initpop"" to see that population is thoroughly mixed)
# initManage = the time step at which management is initiated (do these in multiples of yrMark)
# simTime = time steps for projections (do these in multiples of yrMark)
# number of time steps in a year (e.g. yearMark==12 means a monthly time step)
# MPAsunk = start up cost of enforcing an MPA
# MPAcost = cost of maintaining a unit of MPA per unit time
# SizeSunk = start up cost of enforcing a size limit
# SizeCost = cost of enforcing a size limit per unit time per port
# SeasonSunk = start up cost of enforcing a season
# SeasonCost = cost of enforcing a season per unit of time
# MPAtourism = average revenue generated per unit MPA per unit time for tourism in an MPA
